Class MainController

java.lang.Object
Controller.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
MainController - provides functionality to the "MainMenu.fxml" screen

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    DeleteProductButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "Delete Button" Functionality (Product/Right Side), This method deletes user selected product, asks for confirmation, alerts if no part has been selected, and informs user that if the selected part has associated parts.
    void
    DeleteSelectedPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "Delete Button" Functionality (Part/Left Side), This method deletes user selected part, asks for confirmation, and alerts if no part has been selected *FUTURE ENHANCEMENT* Checking to see if a product contained that part in an associated list and notify it needed to be removed if found.
    void
    ExitApp(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "Exit Button" Functionality This method closes the application.
    private void
    generateNewPartID()
    This method loops through the list of current IDs and adds 1 to the highest value to generate the new ID "newPartID" will remain at 1 if all Parts have been removed *RUNTIME ERROR* This corrected an issue where if a part that was not the one with the highest part ID was deleted before adding another part, the new part would be generated with the same ID as the highest ID.
    private void
    generateNewProductID()
    This method loops through the list of current IDs and adds 1 to the highest value to generate the new ID "newProductID" will remain at 1 if all Parts have been removed *RUNTIME ERROR* This corrected an issue where if a product that was not the one with the highest product ID was deleted before adding another product, the new product would be generated with the same ID as the highest ID.
    void
    initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    Populates the "MainPartsTable" with the current list of parts and "MainProductsTable" with the current list of products.
    void
    PartsSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "PartsSearchTF" Functionality This method takes user input from the "PartSearchTF" and checks for matches, Tableview "MainPartsTable" is populated with matching search results.
    void
    ProductSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "ProductSearchTF" Functionality This method takes user input from the "ProductSearchTF" and checks for matches, Tableview "MainProductsTable" is populated with matching search results.
    void
    ToAddParts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "Add Button" Functionality (Parts/Left Side), This method brings the user to the Add Part screen (AddParts.fxml), On button click, sends the new part ID to the "AddPartsController".
    void
    ToAddProducts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "Add Button" Functionality (Products/Right Side), This method brings user to Add Products Screen (AddProducts.fxml), Sends the new product ID to the "AddProductController"
    void
    ToModifyParts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "Modify Button" Functionality (Parts/Left Side), This method brings the user to the Modify Parts screen (ModifyParts.fxml), Passes user selected Part to the "ModifyPartsController", Alerts user if no product is selected.
    void
    ToModifyProducts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Provides "Modify Button" Functionality (Products/Right Side), This method brings user to Modify Products screen (ModifyProducts.fxml), Passes selected product to "ModifyProductsController", Alerts user if no product is selected

    • generateNewPartID

      private void generateNewPartID()
      This method loops through the list of current IDs and adds 1 to the highest value to generate the new ID "newPartID" will remain at 1 if all Parts have been removed *RUNTIME ERROR* This corrected an issue where if a part that was not the one with the highest part ID was deleted before adding another part, the new part would be generated with the same ID as the highest ID.

    • generateNewProductID

      private void generateNewProductID()
      This method loops through the list of current IDs and adds 1 to the highest value to generate the new ID "newProductID" will remain at 1 if all Parts have been removed *RUNTIME ERROR* This corrected an issue where if a product that was not the one with the highest product ID was deleted before adding another product, the new product would be generated with the same ID as the highest ID.
